tool_description: This API provides the headline News and reference URL  for Climate lively all around the world.
name: Climate-News-API
title: Climate-News-API

api_list.name: Get Climate News From A Specific Reporter
api_list.description:
This endpoint will get climate news from a specific reporter.
You can include reporters from the following:
1. cityam
2. thetimes
3. guardian
4. telegraph
5. nyt
6. latimes
7.  smh
8. un
9. bbc
10.  es
11.  sun
12. nyp
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/nyp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Latest Climate News
api_list.description: This endpoint will retreive all latest news on climate all around the world.
